Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.setup

Interface Summary
Migration Top interface for all migrations.
TraceableMigration Classes implementing this interface may be declared on the changelog.xml file to have access to the database connection before the hibernate persistence system is loaded.
UntraceableMigration Deprecated. New classes should implement TraceableMigration to report the number of updated rows
 

Class Summary
Arguments Handle setup arguments.
CreateBasicData Creates basic data, like application version, permissions, groups, a system administrator and the default settings
CreateDataBase Creates the database tables
CreateInitialData Creates a set of default account related data, as well as other default data.
DataBaseConfiguration Class used to manage database configuration, validate the connection, generate the database when in embedded mode and apply automatic schema updates.
ExportScript Exports the database table create script to a given file, and prints it to stdout
Permissions Defines all modules on the system
Setup Generate cyclos default data
Version Represents a version on the upgrade descriptor.
VersionHistory Keeps track of version history
VersionHistoryReader Class used to read the version reader from a XML file
